class_libraries.library:
<class name="robotnik_laser_filters/LinearInterpolationLaserScanIntensityFilter" type="robotnik_laser_filters::LinearInterpolationLaserScanIntensityFilter" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
This is a filter which filters sensor_msgs::LaserScan messages based on intensity. Interpolates from 0 to 100 the current intensity values and filters out all those lower than the configured percentage.
